statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{21 \, x^{3} + 11 \, x^{2} + 5 \, x - 11 , -3 \, x^{3} - 6 \, x , -3 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} + 5 \, x + 4 , -6 \, x^{3} - 3 \, x^{2} + x + 2 , x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x - 1\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
